column1: #text=Last year I planted a fig tree with my grandfather .
#text=Ordinarily we would n't have to plant a tree , but his old tree had died over the winter .
#text=We live in kind of a cold climate so fig trees really do n't grow well here , and if they do you usually wo n't get figs .
#text=They 're more often used as ornamental plants around here , but the trees my grandfather has always produce figs .
#text=After we got rid of the old tree , we planted the new one near where the old one had been .
#text=The important thing about growing these kinds of trees in this area is getting them to survive the winter .
#text=What we did was we got a bunch of maple leaves and some chicken wire fencing .
#text=We wrapped the chicken wire around the tree and stuffed the space between with the leaves .
#text=Then we wrapped the whole thing with an insulated landscaping tarp .
#text=We will know in a couple of weeks if the new tree survived the winter .
